name: AuthForge
desc: A collection of PHP components to integrate industry-standard authentication and authorization

name: FluentCache
desc: A fluent cache builder API for PSR-16 compatible cache components

name: HyperPlug
desc: A PHP library for plugging into HTTP sockets with immutability and safety as core principals

name: TypeEx
desc: A collection of useful (and C# inspired) types and behavior extensions for PHP

name: XArray
desc: An awesome way to build and navigate through multi-dimensional PHP data structures
